page.title: 01BISHOP MIDDLEHAM AREA
page.content:
Bishop Middleham is the only village that is wholly included in the survey area.
The original village centred mainly around the green has now expanded to incorporate new housing. The village has few shops,little industry,an ancient church and a modern primary school.
The surrounding countryside is almost exclusively agricultural with farms well distributed throughout the area.
Very few of the inhabitants of the village are employed locally. The majority travelling to the larger towns and cities for their employment.
